docs.snippet: The Super Bowl is during the New York area’s coldest time of year, so meteorologists said the possibility of frigid temperatures and snow should come as no surprise....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Super Bowl is during the New York area’s coldest time of year, so meteorologists said the possibility of frigid temperatures and snow should come as no surprise.
docs.abstract: Meteorologists warn that frigid New York temperatures could result in snow for the Super Bowl, as NFL commissioner Roger Goodell urges fans to embrace the cold.

docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; former Dallas Cowboys player Josh Brent is sentenced to 180 days in jail and 10 years of probation for drunken car crash that killed his friend and teammate Jerry Brown; other football news noted.

docs.abstract: Norwegian Cruise ship will dock on the West Side of Manhattan for five days on Manhattan's West Side to serve as a hotel for 4,000 Super Bowl fans; neighbors have expressed concerns about noise and unruly fans (Series: Super Bowl).
